headline.main: Andrew McNally, 92, Ex-Chief Of Company Known for Maps

lead_paragraph: Andrew McNally III, a former president of the map maker Rand McNally & Company, died on Thursday at his home in Chicago. He was 92. He was a great-grandson of another Andrew McNally, who was a co-founder of the company in the mid-1800's.
abstract: Andrew McNally III, former president of map maker Rand McNally & Company, dies at age 92 (M)
snippet: Andrew McNally III, a former president of the map maker Rand McNally & Company, died on Thursday at his home in Chicago. He was 92.    He was a great-grandson of another Andrew McNally, who was a co-founder of the company in the mid-1800's....
